name: Toy Mania
description:
Incredible Machine TOY remake!!

In Toy Mania your objective is to make the ball reach the goal boat using various intricate component placements. Use your arsenal on the right to drag and drop the components on to your screen and find ways to get the ball in!!

Eyad Tawfik - 3D Artists, Coordinator

Nick Cerisano - Programmer

Jason - Level Designer

Ian Wang - 2D Artist, UI

Lukas Radlin - Sound, UI
